segments.text: Good morning . I want to apply for a library card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me 10 yuan , your ID card and a photo of you please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I hear that the card is free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . But you must pay a deposit for the card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There will be a refund when I return the card , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if the card is well kept and has no dirt and scratches .
segments.speaker: S2
